overview: From 2025-06-27 to 2025-06-28, elizaos-plugins/registry had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 9 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add @bealers/plugin-mattermost to registry
topPRs.author: bealers
topPRs.body:
This PR adds @bealers/plugin-mattermost to the registry.

- Package name: @bealers/plugin-mattermost
- GitHub repository: github:bealers/plugin-mattermost
- Version: 0.1.6
- Description: Mattermost client plugin for ElizaOS - enables AI agent integration with Mattermost chat platforms

Submitted by: @bealers

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Added a new entry for "@bealers/plugin-mattermost" to the plugin index.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: feat: add TokenMetrics plugin to registry
topPRs.author: ashuxshimra
topPRs.body:
## 🎯 Plugin Submission: Token Metrics Crypto Trading & Market Data Plugin

### 📋 Plugin Details
- **Package Name**: `@elizaos/plugin-tokenmetrics`
- **Repository**: https://github.com/token-metrics/plugin-tokenmetrics
- **Category**: Cryptocurrency Trading & Market Data Analysis
- **License**: MIT
- **Maintainer**: Token Metrics Team 

### 🏗️ File Structure & Paths

plugin-tokenmetrics/
├── README.md # Comprehensive documentation (650+ lines)
├── LICENSE # MIT License
├── package.json # Package configuration with proper @elizaos naming
├── tsconfig.json # TypeScript configuration
├── src/
│ ├── index.ts # Main plugin export
│ ├── actions/ # 21+ action implementations
│ │ ├── price.ts # Real-time price data
│ │ ├── trading-signals.ts # AI trading recommendations
│ │ ├── technical-analysis.ts # Technical indicators
│ │ ├── sentiment.ts # Market sentiment analysis
│ │ └── ... (17 more actions)
│ ├── providers/ # Service providers
│ ├── evaluators/ # Response evaluators
│ └── types/ # TypeScript definitions
└── dist/ # Built JavaScript files


### 🚀 Core Features & Capabilities
- **📊 21+ TokenMetrics API Endpoints**: Complete integration covering all major crypto data categories
- **💰 Real-time Market Data**: Live prices, market cap, volume, and trading metrics
- **🎯 AI-Powered Trading Signals**: Buy/sell/hold recommendations with confidence scores
- **📈 Technical Analysis**: RSI, MACD, moving averages, and advanced indicators
- **🧠 Sentiment Analysis**: Social media sentiment and market psychology insights
- **📋 Portfolio Management**: Risk assessment, allocation recommendations, and performance tracking
- **🔍 Token Intelligence**: Comprehensive token research and fundamental analysis
- **🌐 Natural Language Processing**: Context-aware query understanding and intelligent responses

### 🛠️ Technical Implementation
- **✅ Tested with ElizaOS AI Agent**: Integrated with ElizaOS AI Agent and successfully tested it.
- **✅ ElizaOS Plugin Standards**: Implements complete Plugin interface with proper action/evaluator structure
- **✅ TypeScript Excellence**: Full type safety with comprehensive interfaces and type definitions
- **✅ Memory Management**: Context-aware conversations with intelligent state management
- **✅ Production Ready**: Comprehensive testing, build pipeline, and distribution setup

### 📚 Documentation Quality
- **✅ Comprehensive README**: 650+ lines with complete setup, configuration, and usage examples
- **✅ API Documentation**: Detailed endpoint coverage with request/response examples
- **✅ Integration Guide**: Step-by-step ElizaOS integration instructions
- **✅ Natural Language Examples**: Real-world query patterns and expected responses
- **✅ Troubleshooting Guide**: Common issues and solutions with verification commands

### 🎯 Registry Integration
- **Package Name**: `@elizaos/plugin-tokenmetrics` (following ElizaOS naming convention)
- **Repository Path**: `github:token-metrics/plugin-tokenmetrics`
- **Clean Commit**: Single focused commit with descriptive message
- **File Changes**: Only `index.json` modified with 1 addition, 0 deletions


### 💡 Value Proposition
This plugin transforms ElizaOS agents into sophisticated cryptocurrency trading assistants with access to institutional-grade TokenMetrics data, AI-powered insights, and comprehensive market analysis capabilities. It provides one of the most complete crypto data integrations available for any AI agent framework.

### 🎯 Example Natural Language Queries
- "What's the current price of Bitcoin and should I buy now?"
- "Show me trading signals for Ethereum"
- "Analyze the sentiment around Solana"
- "Give me a portfolio recommendation for DeFi tokens"
- "What are the top performing altcoins this week?"

### ✅ PR Requirements Checklist
- [x] **Clean Commit**: Single focused commit with descriptive message
- [x] **Clear Description**: Comprehensive plugin overview with technical details
- [x] **Proper Folder Paths**: Complete file structure and organization documented
- [x] **Alphabetical Positioning**: Correctly placed in registry index.json
- [x] **Production Ready**: Full TypeScript support, comprehensive documentation
- [x] **MIT License**: Open source license included
- [x] **Maintainer Permissions**: Enabled for conflict resolution
- [x] **ElizaOS Standards**: Follows all plugin development guidelines

---

**🔗 Repository**: https://github.com/token-metrics/plugin-tokenmetrics  
**📧 Contact**: Available via GitHub issues in plugin repository  
**👥 Team**: TokenMetrics Development Team

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Added a new plugin entry for "@elizaos/plugin-tokenmetrics" to the configuration.
